thread.title: Germany Looks to Tighten Security Net With Antiterror Tool
thread.title_full: Germany Looks to Tighten Security Net With Antiterror Tool - WSJ

author: Ruth Bender
title: Germany Looks to Tighten Security Net With Antiterror Tool
text:
BERLIN—German police on Thursday unveiled a new analytical tool they hope will give investigators accurate predictions about the likelihood that known extremists will carry out a terror attack.
The move comes as the country’s security apparatus is under pressure for failing to prevent a deadly attack in Berlin last year even though police and intelligence officers had tracked the perpetrator for months.

Security officials knew...
